patthana21.52:4.1: Nasārammaṇaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anārammaṇo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana21.52:5.1: Naanārammaṇaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anārammaṇo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana21.52:5.4: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.52:6.2: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … aññamaññe ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.52:7.1: Nasārammaṇaṃ naanidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anārammaṇo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.52:7.3: Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana21.52:8.1: Nocittaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana21.52:9.1: Nanocittaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana21.52:10.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.52:11.1: Nacetasikaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacetasiko sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.52:12.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.52:13.1: Nacittasampayuttaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittavippayutto sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.52:14.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.52:15.1: Nacittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittavisaṃsaṭṭho sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.52:16.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.52:17.1: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.52:18.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.52:19.1: Nocittasahabhuṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasahabhū sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.52:20.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.52:21.1: Nocittānuparivattiṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittānuparivattī sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.52:22.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.52:23.1: Nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.52:24.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.52:25.1: Nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.52:26.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.52:27.1: Nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.52:28.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.52:29.1: Naajjhattikaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bāhiro sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana21.52:30.1: Nabāhiraṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bāhiro sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana21.52:31.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.52:32.1: Noupādā nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upādā sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.52:33.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana21.52:34.1: Naupādinnaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anupādinno sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.52:35.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
